info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:40PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Arapahoe County through 715 PM MDT... At 639 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Deer Trail, or 34 miles northwest of Limon, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Arapahoe County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
